resources.string: Spell checker uses entries from your contact list
Sync your personal dictionary across devices
Deletes your synced data from Google
Your synced data will be deleted from the cloud. Are you sure?

Your personal dictionary will be synced and backed up to Google servers. The statistical information of word frequency may be collected to help improve our products. The collection and usage of all the information will be compliant with Google\'s Privacy Policy.
Please add a Google account to this device to enable this feature
Sync is not available for devices with Google Apps for Business accounts
Language switch key covers other input methods too
Show when multiple input languages are enabled
Use names from Contacts for suggestions and corrections
Double tap on spacebar inserts a period followed by a space
Capitalize the first word of each sentence
Do not suggest potentially offensive words
Spacebar and punctuation automatically correct mistyped words
Use the previous word in making suggestions
Input a word by sliding through the letters
See the suggested word while gesturing
Input spaces during gestures by gliding to the space key
No voice input methods enabled. Check Languages & input settings.
"Your custom input style needs to be enabled before you start using it. Do you want to enable it now?"
Physical Alt key shows the emoji palette
"Please check \"%s\" in your Languages & input settings. This will authorize it to run on your device."
"%s is already enabled in your Languages & input settings, so this step is done. On to the next one!"
"Next, select \"%s\" as your active text-input method."
Now you can type in all your favorite apps with %s.
Display application icon in the launcher

The selected language on your mobile device has an available dictionary.
We recommend downloading the %1$s dictionary to improve your typing experience.

The download could take a minute or two over 3G. Charges may apply if you don\'t have an unlimited data plan.
If you are not sure which data plan you have, we recommend finding a Wi-Fi connection to start the download automatically.

Tip: You can download and remove dictionaries by going to Languages & input in the Settings menu of your mobile device.
Downloading: suggestions for %1$s will be ready soon.
You don\'t have any words in the user dictionary. To add a word, tap the Add (+) button.
The data could not be read because it is not in the correct format
In order for you to benefit fully from some app features we need access to your location. You have complete control over your visibility
This app needs access to your camera so you can take pictures
We require access to your photos/camera to set your user profile picture as well as for other details
We require access to your phone state.
Please Make a Connection And Try Again.
Please click BACK again to exit
Sorry we are unable to reach server at this time
Please make your email as public in facebook
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

Password should have atleast 8 characters One upper character ,One lower Character,One Special character, One digit

you have able to enter only 15 characters
Image format should be PNG/JPEG.Video must be no longer than 30 sec.

Please select image or video first
Old password should have atleast 8 characters ,One upper character ,One lower Character,One Special character, One digit
New password should have atleast 8 characters ,One upper character ,One lower Character,One Special character, One digit
Confirm password should have atleast 8 characters ,,One upper character ,One lower Character,One Special character, One digit
Confirm password needs to be the same as new password
